posts.post_content:
Hi. Trying to raise funds for other purchases. Will sell outright, $50 + $3 for shipping & delivery conf. Would also consider trades for T206 or T205 White Sox I need, Obaks, T206 Powers, Snodgrass (catching), any Old Mill, EPDG, Tolstoi or AB all SGC 50 or better only. Send scans (absolutely necessary, sorry!) to [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Sold - thanks Jantz!
bump for price reduction. $45 with free shipping (c'mon guys - I need the dough for another purchase on the B/S/T!)

Tony

If its the same Schreck you have scanned in your other thread, then I will take it if its still available.

Let me know. You can PM or email me.

Thanks

Jantz
